plugin.name: RHQStorage
plugin.description: Monitoring of RHQ Storage features and performance

c:simple-property.name: connectorAddress
c:simple-property.description: The RMI URL with which to connect to the RHQ Storage Node (e.g. service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:7199/jmxrmi).

c:simple-property.name: type
c:simple-property.description: The type used to establish the EMS connection to the RHQ Storage Node.

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: The login username

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The login password

c:simple-property.name: baseDir
c:simple-property.description: The base directory from which the Cassandra Daemon was launched.

c:simple-property.name: yamlConfiguration
c:simple-property.description: YAML Configuration File

c:simple-property.name: nativeTransportPort
c:simple-property.description: The port on which the Storage Node listens for CQL client connections.

c:simple-property.name: storagePort
c:simple-property.description: The port on which the Storage Node listens for internode communication.

c:simple-property.name: jmxPort
c:simple-property.description: The JMX port for the RHQ Storage Node

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: The host on which the RHQ Storage Node listens to CQL client connections

c:simple-property.name: clusterName
c:simple-property.description: Cluster name

c:simple-property.name: authenticator
c:simple-property.description: RHQ Storage Node client authenticator

c:simple-property.name: commandLine
c:simple-property.description: the command line of the JVM at the time it was discovered - only used by JVMs with type Local; if the command line of the JVM changes, this property's value will need to be updated accordingly in order for RHQ to connect to the JVM

c:simple-property.name: shutdownResult
c:simple-property.description: Shutdown the Cassandra daemon

c:simple-property.name: startResult
c:simple-property.description: Start the Cassandra daemon

c:simple-property.name: startResult
c:simple-property.description: Restart the Cassandra daemon

operation.name: decommission
operation.description: Take the storage node out of service

operation.name: uninstall
operation.description: Removes all of the storage node files from disk

operation.name: readRepair
operation.description: Runs read repair on primar range of rhq and system_auth keyspaces

operation.name: prepareForUpgrade
operation.description: Prepares the storage node for upgrade (this operation consists of following steps: 1) turning off the RPC server, 2) turning off the gossiper, 3) taking the snapshot (backuping the data), 4) invoking the drain operation

c:simple-property.name: snapshotName
c:simple-property.description: Snapshot name. If left empty current system time in milliseconds will be used as the snapshot name.

c:simple-property.name: prepareForUpgradeResult
c:simple-property.description: Prepares the storage node for upgrade (this operation consists of following steps: 1) turning off the RPC server, 2) turning off the gossiper, 3) taking the snapshot (backuping the data), 4) invoking the drain operation

operation.name: updateSeedsList
operation.description: Updatess the node's seeds property in cassandra.yaml

operation.name: updateConfiguration
operation.description: Updates the node configuration. Will require a separate server restart for the settings to take effect.

c:simple-property.name: jmxPort
c:simple-property.description: JMX port JVM option.

c:simple-property.name: heapSize
c:simple-property.description: The heap size to be used for both -Xms and -Xmx JVM options.

c:simple-property.name: heapNewSize
c:simple-property.description: The heap new size to be used be used with -Xmn JVM option.

c:simple-property.name: threadStackSize
c:simple-property.description: The thread stack size. This memory is allocated to each thread off heap. The value should be an integer that will be interpreted in kilobytes.

c:simple-property.name: restartIfRequired
c:simple-property.description: If [true] then restart the server at the end of the update if and if only the updates made require a restart. If [false] the server will not be restarted regardless of the updates made.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: Outcome of updating the configuration.

c:simple-property.name: minHeapSize
c:simple-property.description: The minimum heap size. This value will be used with the -Xms JVM option. This is read only because it is automatically set to the same value as Max Heap Size.

c:simple-property.name: maxHeapSize
c:simple-property.description: The maximum heap size. This value will be used with the -Xmx JVM option. The value should be an integer with a suffix of M or G to indicate megabytes or gigabytes.

c:simple-property.name: heapNewSize
c:simple-property.description: The size of the new generation portion of the heap. This value will be used with the -Xmn JVM option. The value should be an integer with a suffix of M or G to indicate megabytes or gigabytes.

c:simple-property.name: threadStackSize
c:simple-property.description: The thread stack size. This memory is allocated to each thread off heap. The value should be an integer that will be interpreted in kilobytes.

c:simple-property.name: heapDumpOnOOMError
c:simple-property.description: Generate a heap dump when an OutOfMemoryError occurs

c:simple-property.name: heapDumpDir
c:simple-property.description: The directory in which heap dumps will be written.

c:simple-property.name: cqlPort
c:simple-property.description: The port on which to listen for client requests over the native, CQL protocol. This is a shared, cluster-wide setting.

c:simple-property.name: gossipPort
c:simple-property.description: The port used for internode communication. This is a shared, cluster-wide setting.

server.name: Cassandra Server JVM
server.description: The JVM of the Cassandra node

c:simple-property.name: type
c:simple-property.description: The EMS connection type for this JVM (cannot be modified)
